meaningMnemonic:
When you <kanji>roast</kanji> <kanji>tea</kanji>, you get <vocabulary>green tea</vocabulary>, also known as <vocabulary>green leaf tea</vocabulary>or <vocabulary>sencha</vocabulary>.

In reality there are various ways to make green tea, but for the purposes of this mnemonic, let's imagine it's always roasted!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
